content: election day socks © pattern and design copyright stephanie mazur lost socks knits 2024 for personal use only 1 election day socks pattern notes election day in the united states is coming soon and i wanted a pattern for a pair of socks i could wear when i go out to vote in november there aren t many election day sock patterns so i created this little sock design that i can wear on november 5 2024 knit along with me to be ready to make our voices heard voting is the cornerstone of our democracy and it remains an important tool to hold our officials accountable and participate in shaping our future i encourage you to register to vote check your voter registration and make a plan with a friend to vote for all levels of government on election day techniques these socks are knit top-down with one colorwork chart and an afterthought heel materials yarn 3 colors fingering weight yarn exact yarn usage for socks will depend on size height of leg and length of foot suggested yarns is knit picks stroll mc white 50-100g cc1 blue 10-20g cc2 red 10-20g needles size 1 needles or needle size required to achieve sock fit preference needle style may be double pointed needles 24 circular needle or 9 circular needle as preferred additional materials tapestry needle stitch marker scissors waste yarn sizing the sock pattern is written for 3 sizes s m l the socks are designed to fit approximate foot circumference 8 9 10 inches this can vary based on gauge needle size and sock fit preference please ensure that your chosen size matches with your knitting style materials and preferred fit feel free to size up or down to fit your preferences if your colorwork section is too tight or you prefer to knit colorwork with a larger needle size use size 1 5 needles gauge in blocked stockinette stitch 4 x 4 = 32 sts x 36 rounds abbreviations bor beginning of round p purl cc contrast color repeat repeat co cast on round round cont continue sl slip dpns double pointed needles st stitch k knit sm stitch marker k2tog knit 2 together ssk slip slip knit mc main color thank you so much for downloading this free knitting pattern i would love to see your progress and final version please share your work on ravelry as a project or tag me on instagram @lostsocks knits with #electiondaysocks or send me an email this pattern is for personal use only for questions support or errors please email me lostsocks knits@gmail com © pattern and design copyright stephanie mazur lost socks knits 2024 for personal use only 2 election day socks sock instructions cuff with mc co 56 64 72 stitches join in round without twisting stitches place sm to mark bor *k 1 p 1* repeat from * to end of round repeat for 10 more rounds or until cuff is desired length leg using mc
